newsitem.title: USA: AirNet Systems moving to NYSE.
newsitem.headline: AirNet Systems moving to NYSE.

text.p: AirNet Systems Inc said it intends to shift trading of its stock to the New York Stock Exchange on June 30.
The company has been trading on the Nasdaq since May 1996.

"We are moving to the New York Stock Exchange in order to provide our shareholders tigheter bid-ask spreads in the market and we believe the New York Stock Exchange will provide a higher profile venue," Chairman, President and Chief Executive Jerry Mercer said in a statement.
AirNet is to be traded under the symbol, ANS.
